trade_rationale: Institutional Candle with Imbalance detected. Large candle shows institutional activity, followed by price imbalance creating entry opportunity.. Counter-trend trade - expecting reversal.
Strong momentum pattern identified. Price showing clear directional movement with potential for continuation after retracement.. Range-bound market - trading breakout from consolidation.
Force pattern detected. Stop hunt followed by sharp reversal indicates institutional accumulation/distribution and potential trend change.. Trade aligns with uptrend (price above MA20 and MA50).
